title: Ticket #1766: ARCH=INTEL even when running on x64 versions of Windows
description:
Since Condor is running 32 bit binaries on all flavors of Windows, these binaries run in the WOW64 sandbox on x64 flavors of Windows. So when Condor asks for the system architecture, it gets back the arch of the WOW64 sandbox rather than the native arch.

The fix is to call GetNativeSystemInfo but this API is not available on Windows 2000, so this problem was complex to fix before we dropped Win2k support.

The workaround is simple, just add ARCH=X86_64 to condor_config.local for machines that are running a x64 Windows OS.
